author: jameshe5018
content:
mentioned in the pectra interop call today, but <@881905303011086387> brought up some good tests that we should be looking at in devnet 4
- a test that ensures that the deposits from the old (voting) and new (via payload) mechanism get processed in the correct order, because the new ones start arriving before the old ones are fully done due to the delay of the old mechanism
- ensure that validator indices are only assigned on finality, so that one cannot run into a situation where beaconchain explorers provide different indices after refreshing etc
